#### 1.安装ssh客户端和服务端
```shell
sudo apt install openssh-server/openssh-client
```

#### 2.查看ssh服务器是否开启
```shell
netstat -tlp | grep ssh
```

#### 3.查看ip地址
```shell
ip addr | grep inet
```

#### 4.查看系统
```shell
cat /etc/os-release
```

#### 5.生成公钥和私钥
```shell
ssh-keygen -t rsa
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

#### 6.SSH and GPG keys(PC)
```shell
ssh-rsa  se7en@se7en-pc
```

#### 7.git命令
```shell
git add .
git status
git commit -m 'first
git push
owm
ow
klh
```
